General.Name: Seung Il Corporation
General.Description: Seung Il Corporation manufactures and sells aerosol and regular cans. The company offers aerosol cans, valves, valve components, top and bottoms, and button and caps for use in insecticide, cosmetic, industrial, and export markets, as well as for household and industrial products; and rectangular, pail, unround, and round cans for oil, sauce, starch sugar, lubricant, and chemical products. It also provides gas filling service for aerosol products. Seung Il Corporation was founded in 1961 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
